Summary: It was a glowing reddish silent slow moveing just abovethe tree line no more than 1/4 mile away
divs: Sighting DetailsI heard a noise out side and went out to investigate and i leaned against my truck stareing into the back yard and thats when the object came out from above the tree line it was moveing real slow i ran into the house and called my wife and ran into the back yard and watched it for about 2 minutes then i ran into the house to get camera came out and i got a very short viedo of it when i then ran back out to the front yard to get my other camera to get more viedo by that time it dissapeared behind the trees. I just was watching ufo viedos on the internet before all this happen and the viedo was a ufo that was filmed in portland oregon amagine that WOW that was wierd huh.Witnessed by me my wife and my son.
